name: Fairy Forest Chores
description: This interactive fiction game was made in one day, 12/16/2022, to practice my Harlowe and Twine skills. It is a very short (~1250 words), light-hearted story about a fairy and how she chooses to complete her daily chores in the forest. No warnings. It's meant to be simple and a chance for me to practice my coding skills. Everything here (code, writing, art) is by me. Hopefully you enjoy!
